name: My Solar System
description:
This is my Solar System Project.

The system simulates the motion of the planets of the solar system with large satellites. The sizes of the planets and the distances between them are not scaled in proportions and are shown schematically. The speeds of the planets and the speeds of rotation of space objects are scaled.

     Mercury

    Venus  

    Earth

    Mars

    Jupiter

    Saturn

    Uranus

    Neptune

Created by Natalia for the course "Game Design and Development 1: 2D Shooter"
https://www.coursera.org/specializations/game-design-and-development
